Developments that propose waste management facilities should include an appropriately detailed plan for the site during construction, operation and decommissioning. Tower Hamlets Local Plan 379 REUSE, RECYCLING AND WASTE Supporting text 20.35 This policy relates to the provision of new and enhanced waste management facilities (including those replacing, expanding, or intensifying existing sites as well as capacity on exempt sites) and seeks to direct them towards the most appropriate and sustainable locations which maximise the efficient use of the land and do not have any unacceptable impacts.
